title: USELESS RIOT FROM THE MORNING
body: I THING SOMEONE HACKED MY ACC I CREATED TICKED FROM THE MORNING 0 RESPONCE   HOW CAN I FIND MY ACC I DONT REMEMBER MY EMAIL SINCE I CREATE IT WHEN WAS SEASON 2 ON EUNE SERVER  ANY HELP PLS {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
Account recoveries take quite a bit of investigation to resolve. If you've already created a ticket, I encourage you to remain being patient while a specialist gets back to you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
if i dont remember my email   is that bad thing i  give my current eimail not for the game beacose i forgot it can we find my acc ?
Putting in whatever information you remember is the best that we ask of you. I'm confident one of our account specialists will be able to work with you to sort this out for good.
